title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3339/86 of 31 October 1986 extending the provisional measures applicable to imports into Spain of urea originating in certain third countries
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3339/86
of 31 October 1986
extending the provisional measures applicable to imports into Spain of urea originating in certain third countries
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 1 of Regulation (EEC) No 2565/86 '31 October 1986' and '15 000 tonnes' are replaced by '30 November 1986' and '20 000 tonnes' respectively.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 November 1986.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 31 October 1986.
For the Commission
Willy DE CLERCQ
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 35, 9. 2. 1982, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 229, 15. 8. 1986, p. 8.
